Holy shit. I never thought about it that way before â€“ what if the mouse Nazrin has on her basket is her child? Well, probably not her actual child, but still a close-knit bond like a small family and not just as her underlings.

Though a wholly separate faction of [**rat youkai**](https://warhammerfantasy.fandom.com/wiki/Skaven) would certainly be interesting, yes-yes.
